data.title: Own a Leading Restoration Franchise with Paul Davis
data.meta_description: Own a Paul Davis franchise – the community-first choice in property restoration. Lead with excellence in this rewarding business opportunity.
data.text:
Your Go-To Restoration Franchise.

Always Essential. Always Needed.

AVERAGE REPORTED

GROSS SALES

PER FRANCHISE

2 YEARS OR GREATER

$5,836,208

Get Started With Paul Davis Franchising Today

Are you ready to own a prosperous business with unlimited growth potential and make a difference in your community?

Paul Davis Restoration can help you achieve your personal and professional goals.

We Build Big Businesses

As a Paul Davis franchise owner, there is no cap on your growth potential. The reported revenue for our locations two years and older is just over $5 Million.

Quick Ramp Up

In 2020 our launch team assisted new franchisees in achieving multi-national record sales growth. Locations that have been open less than two years averaged over $1.7 Million in revenue.

No Prior Experience Required

Our proven business systems work! Our franchisees come from a variety of professional backgrounds unrelated to our industry and create highly-successful businesses that own a significant portion of the market in their area.

Which Perfect Candidate Are You?

Previous Business Owner

Seeking out opportunities to flex your knowledge and add to your experience.

READ MORE

Motivated MillenNial

Looking for a rewarding career and wants more from life than to punch a timeclock.

READ MORE

Corporate Leader

Eager to utilize a life-times’ worth of knowledge and experience for your own benefit.

READ MORE

POWER PARTNERS

Partnership allows individuals with different strengths to equally contribute to a business.

READ MORE

Paul Davis Restoration can help you achieve your personal and professional goals.

Paul Davis is More than a Restoration Company

You and your team can make a positive impact on your clients in their time of need. We are North America’s leading insurance restoration network. You, as a Paul Davis Restoration franchisee, work directly with the property owner’s insurance company. This alleviates the stress your client is under and allows every franchise location to take on high-paying jobs. Our long-standing revenue-generating partnerships with insurance agencies are just one way Paul Davis builds wealth for our franchise owners. We service residential and commercial properties alike and specialize in cleanup and damage repair services resulting from various situations, so there is always a need for our services. Join Paul Davis Restoration and invest in the profitable restoration marketplace as well as your future.

Move into the Future with Paul Davis

Our legacy allows us to put a stamp on the future, therefore we are continually creating a future for Paul Davis Restoration. With over 50 successful years growing, thriving, and helping our clients in a time of need, we develop a commitment to our customers and our franchise owners. We seek out ways to innovate our restoration services, so we are always improving.

Benefits Of A Paul Davis Franchise Business

Since franchisees have a wide range of backgrounds, not every one of them will share the same goals or measure achievements in the same way. This is why it’s so important to choose wisely when it comes to the company you work with. Starting a franchise business at a company that aligns itself more closely with how you operate or that gives you the freedom to run at your own discretion will typically be the most suitable option. Paul Davis Restoration is the best company for franchise owners in the residential damage restoration and reconstruction industry because it’s a brand that provides a solid foundation and plenty of support. Our business owners are located across the United States and Canada, yet we maintain close contact with all of them to deliver on our end of the deal. You’ll have many benefits to look forward to when you join our leadership team.

Not only will you have the leeway to operate your business the way you want to, but you’ll also have a large network of professionals to tap into whenever you need it. No one else understands what it’s like to launch a franchise quite like someone who’s been in your shoes before. The home office is dedicated to the success of every one of our business owners, and we act as a dependable source of information. We’re here for you, whether you have questions about everyday operations, marketing, recruitment, or anything else. Plus, you’ll receive useful training that will ensure you’re ready to lead a successful business from day one. Before we even launch a franchise location, we make sure that you’re equipped to meet your customers’ needs at every turn. No matter what your goals are both on a personal and professional level, we’re the franchise to invest in because we can help you achieve what you desire.

Why Paul Davis

Paul Davis has over a 97% success rate for franchises because success is part of our business model

As North America’s leading insurance restoration network, our relationships with national insurance and commercial accounts benefits each franchise

Ongoing research and training on improved methods keep us at the industry forefront

We dominate the market, not saturate it – your location doesn’t compete against other Paul Davis franchises for business

Our business model is designed to create wealth – we build large businesses

Supportive home office with a ratio of 1:10 office personnel to franchise owner

Retain your top employees with collaboration, effective training and transparent operations

Multiple Awards & Commendations!

We are a company with significant resources and expertise that handles complex recovery situations. Our accolades show we are the leading damage restoration franchise to own.

Paul Davis is a Local Business with a Big Heart

Paul Davis Restoration offers many diverse benefits for our franchise owners to build their business and contribute to the growth of our company at large. As an established organization, our name stands out and we own our part of the service sectors.

We also have the added benefit of the camaraderie shared within a small business. The combination of big business expertise and the community-based family business is what makes Paul Davis Restoration an extraordinary company.

What Our People Have to Say

“We’ve grown our company from a $2 million a year in revenue company to last year, $16 million. It’s all about the people on our team.”

Darren Impson, Franchise Owner. Tampa, FL
